column1: Master of Public Health with Extended Placement
column3: School of Life and Medical Science
column5: Why choose Herts?MPH Public Health with Extended Placement enables you to develop your knowledge and skills during your placement. Throughout the course you'll combine the work of public health theory, practice and research.The University of Hertfordshire was ranked 2nd in the East of England for Social Policy (2023 Complete University Guide).You'll be taught by Public Health experts within Life and Medical Science, Nursing and Social Work and The Business School at the University of Hertfordshire.About the courseThe range of optional modules offered and the breadth of cases used across the programme will provide opportunities for specialism in the global and local context.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
